attributes.action: Petition for a change in the law regarding property sales
attributes.additional_details:
Both purchases have fallen through due to sellers changing their minds, not sticking to what was verbally agreed to at time of offer, and not taking the buyer into any consideration at all.  
The second purchase fell through after all the searches and legalities had been done, resulting in her having to pay £632.00 with nothing to show for it!
We need to petition for a system which is fair to both sellers and buyers, such as that used in Scotland whereby an offer to purchase is legal and binding
attributes.background: Our daughter - a first time potential home owner - has made offers which have been accepted on two properties, and both have fallen through although finances were in place and legalities completed.  She is currently still 'sofa-surfing'.
